channel.title: Posts on Joshua's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Joshua's Blog

item.title: How to find Bugs in Android application Using Semgrep
item.description: Introduction Hello, Friends Hope you are all staying safe and Happy. It’s been a long time since I wrote the blog .Finally I am able to kick my lazy ass and sit down to write the blog . So I am a big fan of Android Security . In my free time I used to read and do some research around Android Security Even my first Blog is about Android-Security .

item.title: My Baby Steps in DevSecOps
item.description: Hello everyone In this blog I m gonna explain my baby steps into the DevSecOps During my last Internship at Practical DevSecOps I got an opportunity to take the CDP exam I have learned a lot from the course In this Blog I’m gonna share my experience of my first Certification The Opportunity While exploring DevSecOps I came across a course on DevSecOps from the Practical DevSecOps I was stunned on seeing the course syllabus but was sad on seeing the course fee So I pinged Imran if he can offer me a discount or something.
